formula: Numerators of sequence a[ n, n-1 ] in (a[ i, j ])^2 where a[ i, j ] = A(i, j)/i! if j<=i, 0 if j>ia(n) = (n+1)*(2^n-n-1). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Aug 18 2002G.f.: x^2*(-3+5*x)/((2*x-1)^2*(x-1)^3) [From Maksym Voznyy (voznyy(AT)mail.ru), Aug 14 2009]
maple: a:=n->sum(k*binomial(n,k), k=3..n): seq(a(n), n=3..30); - _Zerinvary Lajos_, May 08 2007a:=n->sum(sum(binomial(n,j), j=2..n),k=0..n): seq(a(n), n=2..29); - _Zerinvary Lajos_, May 08 2007

extensions: G.f. proposed by Maksym Voznyy checked and corrected by R. J. Mathar, Sep 16 2009.
